function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited food truck capacity leading to scarcity of popular food items","Impact":"Disappointment and frustration from customers who are unable to order their desired meals","Mitigation":"Increase food truck capacity or implement a pre-order system to manage demand","Technologies":"Online ordering system, pre-ordering platform","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Regularized schedules leading to high demand and competition for meals","Impact":"Customers missing out on ordering meals due to high demand","Mitigation":"Implement a reservation system or increase the availability of popular meal options","Technologies":"Reservation software, demand forecasting tools","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Prosocial behavior resulting in potential spread of contagious diseases through food sharing","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases among friends and family members through shared meals","Mitigation":"Promote individual meal orders and discourage sharing of meals through public health messaging","Technologies":"Public health messaging, social media communication","People":"Customers","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
